title: Core77 Weekly Roundup (10-15-24 to 10-18-24)
description: Here's what we looked at this week:Form follows function: A clever Norwegian design feature for barns. The effect of videoconferencing on office furniture design, as seen in Steelcase's Ocular line of tables.The Vaaka coffee and tea scale makes me wonder: Is designing people's experiences for mundane tasks needed, or are objects like this contrived?Hozo Design's M-Cube 02, a tripod-free laser level, offers better UX.When form follows function, even with junky tools.As an architecture student, Marcio Sequeira developed these Mola Kits to teach structural modeling. They're now sold worldwide.A clever "Shadowology" illustration technique by Vincent Bal.Model Group and Arburg are experimenting with creating injection molded paper. The INSAFE, a seat belt guide for pregnant women.A beautiful piece of design: This Analogue N64 recreation.Industrial design case study: PDR tackles a corrective brace for teenagers.
author: Rain Noe
excerpt: Here's what we looked at this week: Form follows function: A clever Norwegian design feature for barns. The effect of videoconferencing on office furniture design, as seen in Steelcase's Ocular line of tables. The Vaaka coffee and tea scale makes

html:
Core77 Weekly Roundup (10-15-24 to 10-18-24)

Here's what we looked at this week:

Form follows function: A clever Norwegian design feature for barns.

The effect of videoconferencing on office furniture design, as seen in Steelcase's Ocular line of tables.

The Vaaka coffee and tea scale makes me wonder: Is designing people's experiences for mundane tasks needed, or are objects like this contrived?

Hozo Design's M-Cube 02, a tripod-free laser level, offers better UX.

When form follows function, even with junky tools.

As an architecture student, Marcio Sequeira developed these Mola Kits to teach structural modeling. They're now sold worldwide.

A clever "Shadowology" illustration technique by Vincent Bal.

Model Group and Arburg are experimenting with creating injection molded paper.

The INSAFE, a seat belt guide for pregnant women.

A beautiful piece of design: This Analogue N64 recreation.

Industrial design case study: PDR tackles a corrective brace for teenagers.
